name: Mari's Dessert Pie
author: az_starshine
summary: A luxurious, rich dessert that induces happiness in all who try it...called Mari's Dessert in honor of my sister-in-law who loves it. Garnish with shaved chocolate curls or flaked coconut if desired.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large bowl, Cut the butter into the flour and 1/4 cup sugar until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs; pat mixture into the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish
Bake in preheated oven for 15 to 18 minutes or until lightly browned
In a large bowl, beat the cream cheese and 1/2 cup sugar until smooth
Fold in half of the whipped topping
In the same bowl, Mix pudding according to package directions
